name: Mask Off
description:
"Unhallowed one, before you can be consecrated, the Order demands a test of loyalty.

A heretic was caught travelling to Demeris and slain, but he first stopped at Trisdam and told them of our Order. You must mask all evidence of our existence. Go to Trisdam, and make it clean.

Do not fail us, Unhallowed, or you will never see the light of the true Lord."

Mask Off is a first person stealth game made in less than a week for the Spooktober game jam, which had the theme "mask the truth." In this game, you play as an initiate to a cult, and are tasked with "masking" the truth of your order's existence.

Constrols:

  • WASD - Movement

  • Q/E - Lean Left / Lean Right

  • Ctrl - Toggle Crouch

  • Space - Jump

  • Left Mouse - Sneak Attack

 Notes:

You are not a fighter, and when guards are alerted to your position you won't be able to hurt them. You must escape their pursuit and wait for them to calm back down.
